content: With the Gourd equipped, your drinking speed is massively increased - a huge boon for those who enjoy fast-paced builds and like to be in the thick of the action. It is less strong if you are a er who prefers ing slower and not attacking constantly. One of the other Gourds in the game will be a better choice.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Stained_Jade_Gourd.md', within the main section titled 'Stained Jade Gourd'.
The content is as follows:
With the Gourd equipped, your drinking speed is massively increased - a huge boon for those who enjoy fast-paced builds and like to be in the thick of the action. It is less strong if you are a er who prefers ing slower and not attacking constantly. One of the other Gourds in the game will be a better choice.
